statements: SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT a_name, a_age, a_gender FROM actors;
SELECT a_name, a_age FROM actors WHERE a_gender = 'F';
SELECT a_name, a_age FROM actors WHERE a_age > 30;
SELECT a_name, a_age, a_previous_perf FROM actors ORDER BY a_age DESC;
SELECT a_name, a_age FROM actors WHERE a_gender = 'M' ORDER BY a_age DESC;
SELECT a_name, a_gender, a_availability FROM actors WHERE a_age > 30 AND a_gender = 'F' ORDER BY a_name;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE a_availability = TRUE AND a_previous_perf LIKE '%Theatre%' ORDER BY a_id;
SELECT a_id, a_name, a_age, a_gender FROM actors WHERE a_age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND a_gender = 'M' ORDER BY a_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT a_previous_perf FROM actors WHERE a_availability = FALSE ORDER BY a_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM actors;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors WHERE date_of_birth = '1990-05-15';
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT play_title, role FROM performances WHERE actor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT actor_id, first_name, last_name FROM actors ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM actors WHERE actor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT play_title, role FROM performances WHERE performance_date <= '2022-10-31' ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors JOIN performances ON actors.actor_id = performances.actor_id;
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM actors WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Actors;
SELECT actor_name, age FROM Actors ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM PreviousPerformances WHERE performance_title = 'Hamlet';
SELECT actor_name, age FROM Actors WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT actor_name, performance_title FROM Actors JOIN PreviousPerformances ON Actors.actor_id = PreviousPerformances.actor_id;
SELECT * FROM Actors WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY actor_id DESC;
SELECT actor_name, gender FROM Actors WHERE actor_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT actor_name, performance_title FROM Actors JOIN PreviousPerformances ON Actors.actor_id = PreviousPerformances.actor_id WHERE performance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT actor_name, role_title FROM Actors JOIN FutureRolesAvailability ON Actors.actor_id = FutureRolesAvailability.actor_id WHERE availability_status = 'Available';

SELECT actor_name, age, performance_date FROM Actors JOIN PreviousPerformances ON Actors.actor_id = PreviousPerformances.actor_id WHERE performance_title LIKE '%Musical%' ORDER BY age ASC, performance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM actors
SELECT actor_name, actor_age FROM actors WHERE actor_age > 30
SELECT actor_name, actor_gender FROM actors ORDER BY actor_name DESC
SELECT * FROM performances WHERE performance_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT actor_name, movie_title, role_name FROM performances JOIN roles ON performances.role_name = roles.role_name
SELECT * FROM actors WHERE actor_age > 30 ORDER BY actor_name DESC;
SELECT actor_name, actor_gender FROM actors INNER JOIN performances ON actors.actor_id = performances.actor_id WHERE movie_title='Inception';

SELECT actor_name, role_name FROM actors INNER JOIN performances ON actors.actor_id = performances.actor_id INNER JOIN roles ON performances.role_name = roles.role_name WHERE role_description LIKE '%drama%';

SELECT DISTINCT actor_name, actor_age FROM actors INNER JOIN performances ON actors.actor_id = performances.actor_id INNER JOIN availability ON actors.actor_id = availability.actor_id WHERE available_date='2022-12-25' AND available_slots >= 2;
SELECT actor_name, MAX(actor_age) AS oldest_actor_age FROM actors GROUP BY actor_name HAVING oldest_actor_age > 40 ORDER BY oldest_actor_age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Actors WHERE age > 30;
SELECT actor_name, nationality FROM Actors WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT actor_id, actor_name, age FROM Actors ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Performances WHERE movie_title LIKE '%Star Wars%';
SELECT actor_name, nationality, age FROM Actors WHERE nationality = 'USA' ORDER BY age;
SELECT actor_name, age, nationality FROM Actors;
SELECT * FROM Performances WHERE performance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT movie_title, director FROM Movies ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT actor_name, role FROM Actors JOIN Performances ON Actors.actor_id = Performances.actor_id WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT role_name, salary, description FROM Roles WHERE requirements LIKE '%experience%' ORDER BY salary DESC;
